titles.title: LNG Excise Tax Equalization Act of 2012
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for the equalization of the excise tax on liquefied natural gas and per energy equivalent of diesel.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/25/2012--Introduced. LNG Excise Tax Equalization Act of 2012 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to adjust the excise tax on liquefied natural gas to 24.3 cents per energy equivalent of a gallon of diesel.
